page.title: 04Kirkby Malham and the school
page.content:
{Kirkby Malham}is only a small village of about 20 houses.It originally grew up around the church,and the name "Kirkby Malham" means "Church by Malham",Malham being the nearest village,2 miles away. Kirkby Malham also has a pub,the "Victoria Hotel",and it used to have a police house.
Despite its name,{Kirkby Malham School is actually a mile out of Kirkby Malham and a mile out of Malham,built there deliberately by Walter Morrison in 1874 to unite the 2 villages. It is only a small school,its number on roll usually between 30 and 40.There are 2 classes-Infants(aged 5 to 7),and Juniors(aged 7 to 11).
